以`https://edu.51cto.com/center/course/lesson/index?id=11598_933910`为例：

打开课程，查看浏览器网络请求，查看地址以`vod-play-auth` 结尾的响应内容:

```json
{"status":1,"msg":"\u52a0\u8f7d\u6210\u529f","data":{"info":{"isSeventyFive":0,"playAuth":"","vodVideoId":"80f65f00416b71eeb0736732b68e0102","videoId":"946578","lessonId":"933910","format":"m3u8","encryptType":1,"nexturl":"https:\/\/edu.51cto.com\/\/center\/course\/lesson\/index?id=11598_933909&type=wejob","prevurl":"https:\/\/edu.51cto.com\/\/center\/course\/lesson\/index?id=11598_933911&type=wejob","htime":36,"utime":1711775173,"reportLogUrl":"https:\/\/edu.51cto.com\/center\/player\/log\/time?type=wejoboutcourse"}}}

```
下载视频
```sh
cd aliyun-m3u8-downloader
go run main.go aliyun -p <json里的playAuth> -v  <json里的vodVideoId> -o <保存目录> --chanSize 1
```

```
go run main.go   aliyun -p "" -v 80f65f00416b71eeb0736732b68e0102 -o=example --chanSize 1
```

playAuth 很快就过期，注意操作速度

可以写个简单的程序 把解析json,调用下载代码合并到一起
